legislation: Categories of Casino Regulations 2008 Gambling (Geographical Distribution of Large and Small Casino Premises Licences) Order 2008 Gambling Act 2005
description: Letter dated April 2008 from Gerry Sutcliffe MP to Malcom Moss MP regarding amendment 142 to the Gambling Bill in the context of the Committee debate on the two casino orders on 25/03/2008. 3 p.
department: Dept for Culture Media and Sport
